title: Some tactics for writing in public

title: Car Bloat: “Huge Cars Are Terrible for Society”
dot:
digraph{main[label="Car Bloat in the US"];blindspots[label="Tall vehicles
- Bigger blind spots
- More likely to strike torso/head"];heavier_vehicles[label="Heavier vehicles
- More force in crashes
- Longer braking distances"];tire_pressure[label="Heavier cars
- More tire pressure
- Erode tires faster
- Tire particles harm ecosystems & human health"];solutions[label="Solutions
- Tax vehicles by weight
- Test for pedestrian/cyclist safety
- Require CDL for larger vehicles"];further_reading[label="Further Reading
- Blatant Greenwashing of SUVs
- EVs & Toxic Tire Particles
- Carry That Weight
- The Car Safety Feature That Kills the Other Guy"];main->blindspots;main->heavier_vehicles;main->tire_pressure;main->solutions;main->further_reading;}
